meanings.definition: Suboptimizes: to make less than optimal or less than the best possible
meanings.sent1: She suboptimizes her study time by watching TV instead of focusing on her homework.
meanings.sent2: The company suboptimizes its resources by not investing in new technology.
meanings.sent3: He suboptimizes his chances of winning by always choosing the wrong strategy in the game.
meanings.sent4: The old car suboptimizes fuel efficiency, guzzling gas like a thirsty elephant.
meanings.sent5: Ignoring the weather forecast suboptimizes your picnic plans, leading to a soggy outing.

meanings.definition: Suboptimizes: not reaching the highest level of efficiency or effectiveness
meanings.sent1: The suboptimizes process resulted in delays in completing the project.
meanings.sent2: Their suboptimizes approach to problem-solving led to repeated mistakes.
meanings.sent3: It's hard to take him seriously with his suboptimizes attempts at being funny.
meanings.sent4: The suboptimizes system was like a leaky bucket, unable to hold information securely.
meanings.sent5: The suboptimizes design of the building made it prone to structural issues during storms.
